text: Nabamwe banyarucari bazovuga bababwira bamwe bishima aribo bakuru babo bati:- ahubwo amarorerwa mwagira y’ijoro n’umutaga mugihe mwadutegeka ngo duhakane Imana nukuyigira ngo tuyigirire abafasha bayo nabo bazonyegeza agahinda kabo bafise mugihe bazobona ibihano vyacu, natwe tuzoshira iminyororo mumazosi kuri bamwe bahakanye Umuremyi wabo w’ukuri, none hari ibindi bintu barihwa atari muvyo bahora bagira
